<img src="https://media.istockphoto.com/photos/happy-kids-playing-soccer-at-the-school-picture-id1178694123?k=20&m=1178694123&s=612x612&w=0&h=kV6AlkrOMBNpf8bMbf9_0QHsxkyN2sK1zkcHjcC3_e4="width="350px"height="300px">

<img src="https://www.nickersoncorp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/iStock-146813516.jpg"width="350px"height="300px">
<p style="color:white;font-family:Baskerville;font-size:40px;background:lightgreen;border-radius: 20px">Our large auditorium where our students perform their amazing performances and organize many cultural events.</p>

<img src="https://images.hindustantimes.com/rf/image_size_960x540/HT/p2/2017/07/27/Pictures/_21f03b92-72bf-11e7-a55a-ab3ca1304be3.jpg"width="350px"height="300px">
<p style="color:white;font-family:Baskerville;font-size:40px;background:skyblue;border-radius:20px">well-designed laboratories which helps children to enhance their learning by understanding the theoritical concepts of science which are taught during lectures.</p>
